relevant_findings.temporal_arteries: swollen, indurated, and nodular bilaterally, strong pulses and no tenderness
relevant_findings.lymph_node: nontender, measuring 1 cm in greatest dimension in the posterior cervical chain
relevant_findings.abdominal_examination: mild tenderness in the left lower quadrant and a palpable spleen tip
relevant_findings.joint_examination: warm synovial effusions in right knee and left ankle, left ankle tender
relevant_findings.purpura: palpable and nonpalpable on both legs

physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight decreased from 122.5 kg to 87.5 kg, abdominal pain decreased after treatment with prednisone.
